User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

check for new mail with IMAP


Actual results:

I got an error message that was truncated at the left because I am using a 12" netbook and not a 100" wide screen. Plus, the message cannot be found in the error console.


Expected results:

The message should have been broken up into more than 1 line.
And it should be found in the error console.

(I am not complaining that there is an error message, I am complaing that I can't read it)

comments.text:
(In reply to :aceman from comment #1)
> Can you remember part of the message? Otherwise we can't know which one it
> was to fix it.

See the screenshot that was attached to my bug report. In the meantime I also know the cause of the error, I had "encrypted password" with STARTTLS, and my ISP has told me to use "normal password", and said that it encrypts anyway through STARTTLS.

I suspect that the full text is:
http://transvision.frenchmozilla.org/TMX/beta/de/memoire_en-US_de.tmx
Der IMAP-Server %S scheint die verschlüsselte Übertragung des Passworts nicht zu unterstützen. Wenn Sie das Konto gerade neu einrichten, ändern Sie die Authentifizierungsmethode bitte versuchsweise zu Passwort, normal unter Konten-Einstellungen | Server-Einstellungen. Wenn die gewählten Einstellungen bisher funktioniert haben und nun plötzlich fehlschlagen, informieren Sie bitte Ihren E-Mail-Administrator oder Provider.

The english text isn't that long:
The IMAP server %S does not seem to support encrypted passwords. If you just set up this account, please try changing to 'Normal password' as the 'Authentication method' in the 'Account Settings | Server settings'. If it used to work and now suddenly fails, please contact your email administrator or provider.

> 12" netbook is fine, it mainly depends on your screen resolution. So what is
> your?

1366x768
